text: Egha Iesus ua mɨgɨa ghua ghaze, “Ia dagheba ataghrazir dughiamɨn ia gumazir ifavaribar mɨn uan guabagh ekuan markɨ. Gumazir ifavariba dagheba ataghrazir dughiamɨn, gumaziba men ganasa, me uan guaba ruer puvatɨgha pughpurighav arui. Me odava arazir kabagh ami. Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, me uan ivezim inigha gɨfa.
